ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I read somewhere that the merchant s inventory can depend on what players have sold to them.  So, she might have some if someone else sold them to her. Snyak
ygData.messageBody:
I read somewhere that the merchant's inventory can depend on what players
have sold to them. So, she might have some if someone else sold them to
her.

Snyak

-----Original Message-----
From: Kelly Pruett [mailto:pruett@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 2:11 PM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor

From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>

Are you sure they she sells them. I've never been able to
buy them (don't need
to anyway) and when I sell items, she is one of my favorites
because my selling
price to her tends to be higher. I would be intrested to
find out SHE actually
sold them. If so I would have bought one looooongg ago
instead of fighting the
gnoll commander for mine. Or was that the gnoll elites ...
don't remember. One
of the two of them had it spawn occasionally. But mine was
only like AC+3 and
STR+2(or +3 .... damn I can't remember crap today). I will
check later. I would
be glad to steer new warriors to her shop if she sells them
though.

-Faderic

Dean Boyle wrote:

> From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
>
> Hail! You can get it from the leather/pattern merchant in

they drop them,

couse they add +5
> stg
